name: Shotgun Billie Demo
description:
Shotgun Billie is a fast paced plataforming game where you play as Billie and use his unique habilities to travel at high speeds!

Go through the levels, kill all enemies and try to beat the final boss!

Heat up those legs and reach incredible speeds in this neon filled world!

This game is a proof of concept, we do not guarantee any further development to it.

All of the music in the game was made by Aim To Head and can be found in the links section below.
